title: "Italian" sample from the Bruce Type Foundry
content:
Hello all, wondering whether this typeface from the [Bruce Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828033538/http:/typophile.com/) has been digitised or if anyone can point me toward a fuller printed sample

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828033538im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/bruce-pica-italian_4870.jpg)

Many Thanks

 [‹ (x) Condensed blackletter in Sombrio/Ride logos by Hydro74 - Sky Clad Gothic {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828033538/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36376 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) late 70s-early 80s font on Boards Of Canada album cover - Harry Obese {Ignacio} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828033538/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36375 "Go to next forum topic")
author: edward maddison

comments.content: I don’t know an exact match but [New Boston](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828033538/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/new-boston-wbw/) and [OK Corral](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828033538/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/ok-corral/) are close...
Thank you very much, those are both indeed very close though i would love to get my hands on an original sample
